info.description: Get and management of customer details
info.title: CustomerProfile APIs

parameters.name: countryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the country, normally the SWIFT code of the country.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Get a detail status of the specified service/services

parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

arrangementId.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

loginMethod.description: The type of login method e.g. password, PIN, OTP

smsNumber.description: The mobile telephone SMS number of the customer

phoneNumber.description: This field can contain the phone numbers of the customer.

localCurrencyId.description: The identifier of the local currency of the institution

countryId.description: The identifier of the country, normally the SWIFT code of the country.

currentWorkingDate.description: Identifies the date of business being processed in the financial Instituion.

companyId.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

endDate.description: The date an agreement or contract ceases - the opposite of start date
